buyAdTicket(uint256).custom:error: "Ticket count must be greater than 0" - 티켓 수가 0 이하일 때"Exceeds max tickets per game" - 최대 티켓 수 초과 시"Insufficient AD tokens" - Ad Token 잔액 부족 시"AD token transfer failed" - Ad Token 전송 실패 시"Invalid sender address" - 잘못된 발신자 주소"Game is not active" - 게임이 비활성 상태"Ad Token not set" - Ad Token 주소가 설정되지 않음

params.ticketCount: The number of tickets to buy

returns._0: The remaining game time in seconds

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

withdrawAdTokens(uint256).custom:error: "Amount must be greater than 0" - 금액이 0 이하일 때"Insufficient AD tokens" - Ad Token 잔액 부족 시"AD token transfer failed" - Ad Token 전송 실패 시"Invalid amount" - 잘못된 금액

buyAdTicket(uint256).notice: 사용자가 Ad Token을 사용하여 티켓을 구매합니다구매된 Ad Token은 즉시 소각됩니다

buyTicket(address,uint256).notice: Buy tickets for the current game

initialize(address,address,address,addre.notice: Ad Lottery 게임을 초기화하고 필요한 설정을 구성합니다

registry().notice: Contract registry for managing contract addresses

setAdLotteryFee(uint256).notice: 관리자만 호출 가능하며, 수수료 비율을 변경합니다
